heroSubtitle: Build your savings while automatically contributing 20% to children's education. Every 6 months, your vault helps transform a child's future.
howItWorksSubtitle: A simple three-step process that turns your savings into meaningful impact
stepSaveDesc: Build your vault over 6 months by depositing any amount, any time. Your money grows while you prepare to give.
stepGiveDesc: After 6 months, donate 20% of your savings to children's education. You keep 80% while making a real difference.
stepImpactDesc: Watch your contribution change lives. Every donation provides school supplies and educational materials to children in need.
collectiveImpactSubtitle: Together, our community is making a real difference in children's lives
missionSubtitle: Making Education Accessible for Every Child
missionDesc: AidVault was founded on a simple belief: that everyone can make a difference when given the right tools. We've created a platform that makes charitable giving not just possible, but effortless and rewarding.
testimonialSubtitle: Join thousands of people who are already making a difference
joinCommunity: Join our community of generous savers and start your journey towards meaningful impact. It only takes a few minutes to set up your vault.
noCreditCard: No credit card required. Start with any amount.

testimonials.name: Kate Scott
testimonials.quote: AidVault has transformed the way I approach saving. Knowing that part of my savings directly supports children's education gives real purpose to every contribution.

testimonials.name: Nkurunziza Kevin
testimonials.quote: What distinguishes AidVault is its transparency. The platform clearly shows how funds are used and the impact they create, which builds trust and confidence in the mission.

testimonials.name: Ikirezi Bella
testimonials.quote: AidVault allows me to plan for my own future while contributing to someone else's education. The balance they've created makes saving both practical and meaningful.
